headline: AppLovin (APP) Beats Q3 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
summary: AppLovin (APP) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 31.58% and 6.01%, respectively, for the quarter ended September 2024. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: AppLovin (APP) Beats Q3 Earnings and Revenue Estimates

headline: AppLovin (NASDAQ:APP) Beats Expectations in Strong Q3, Stock Jumps 28.5%
summary: Mobile app advertising platform AppLovin (NASDAQ: APP) reported Q3 CY2024 results exceeding the market’s revenue expectations, with sales up 38.6% year on year to $1.20 billion. Its GAAP profit of $1.25 per share was also 34.8% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

raw.headline: AppLovin (NASDAQ:APP) Beats Expectations in Strong Q3, Stock Jumps 28.5%

headline: AppLovin: Q3 Earnings Snapshot
summary: APP) on Wednesday reported third-quarter net income of $434.4 million. The Palo Alto, California-based company said it had net income of $1.25 per share. The results topped Wall Street expectations.

headline: AppLovin Announces Third Quarter 2024 Financial Results
summary: PALO ALTO, Calif., November 06, 2024--AppLovin Corporation (NASDAQ: APP) ("AppLovin"), a leading marketing platform, today announced financial results for the third quarter ended September 30, 2024 and posted a letter to its shareholders on its Investor Relations website located at https://investors.applovin.com.
